channel.title: [ANSWER]java.lang/java not found error
channel.description:
Hello. If you have one of these two basic errors, your computer either does not have the java JDK or JRE, or it is not set up to know where they are.
Thanks to swift for this tut. Hopefully the lack of copy-pasting will teach you something, good luck. [img]http://img242.imageshack.us/img242/117/javatutab9.gif[/img]

Hello. If you have one of these two basic errors, your computer either does not have the java JDK or JRE, or it is not set up to know where they are.
